author: Peter Nicholas
title: Trump stays on sidelines in Pennsylvania Senate race — for now

sentence: TV personality Dr. Mehmet Oz leads the field for the Republican nomination for Pennsylvania’s U.S. Senate seat, but a large swath of GOP voters is undecided, according to a poll released Monday.
author: Dave Boyer
title: Pa. poll finds Dr. Oz leading with GOP voters, but many still undecided in Senate race

sentence: Dr. Mehmet Oz has been a fixture on television for the past 13 years, ever since Oprah began featuring him as a guest on her talk show.
author: Timothy Evans
title: Dr. Oz's TV staffers say he 'blindsided everyone' when he abruptly fired them to run for Senate

sentence: Former U.S. President Donald Trump on Saturday said he is endorsing celebrity surgeon Dr. Mehmet Oz, who is running as a Republican for U.S. Senate in Pennsylvania.
author: Moira Warburton and Jan Wolfe
title: Trump Endorses Celebrity Surgeon Dr. Mehmet Oz For U.S. Senate Seat In Pennsylvania

sentence: April 9 (UPI) -- Former President Donald Trump has endorsed television personality Dr. Mehmet Oz in his campaign to fill the U.S. Senate seat in Pennsylvania vacated by retiring Sen. Patrick Toomey.
author: Adam Schrader
title: Trump endorses Dr. Oz's campaign for U.S. Senate

sentence: Article content WASHINGTON — Former U.S. President Donald Trump on Saturday said he is endorsing celebrity surgeon Dr. Mehmet Oz, who is running as a Republican in a closely watched U.S. Senate contest in Pennsylvania.
title: Trump endorses Dr. Oz for U.S. Senate seat in Pennsylvania

sentence: Former president Donald Trump on Saturday jumped into a high-stakes intraparty contest, endorsing fellow television celebrity-turned-politician Mehmet Oz in the contested Republican primary for the U.S. Senate in Pennsylvania, where the leading candidates jockeyed aggressively for Trump’s support.
title: Trump endorses Dr. Oz in Pennsylvania Senate race, a key battleground

sentence: “The Great Commonwealth of Pennsylvania has a tremendous opportunity to Save America by electing the brilliant and well-known Dr. Mehmet Oz for the United States Senate.” During his speech in North Carolina, Mr. Trump praised Mr. Oz’s career, adding that his success on television will serve him well with voters.
author: Joseph Clark
title: Trump endorses Dr. Oz for Senate

sentence: Dr Mehmet Oz, a Turkish-American TV personality who made more than 60 appearances on Winfrey's show before it stopped airing in 2011, is running to replace retiring Republican Pat Toomey in Pennsylvania.
author: Tom Acres
title: Donald Trump endorses celebrity surgeon known for guesting on Oprah in crucial Senate race

sentence: The former president said he's backing Mehmet Oz—aka the TV celebrity known as Dr. Oz—in Pennsylvania's Republican Senate primary.
author: John Johnson
title: Trump Endorses Big Name in a Big Race

sentence: On Saturday night, Trump outraged Pennsylvania conservatives by endorsing TV personality Dr. Mehmet Oz, a more moderate Republican candidate for the state's open Senate seat.
author: Madz Dizon
title: Mitch McConnell Warns GOP Could Screw Up Senate Takeover in Midterm Election with "Unacceptable Candidates"

sentence: That might not put Ingraham in rare company, but it is unusual for Fox News hosts to turn on their own — and that’s exactly what “The Ingraham Angle” host did Tuesday night, calling out Hannity and Trump for their endorsement of Dr. Mehmet Oz as the Republican candidate for Senate in Pennsylvania.
author: Josh Dickey
title: Laura Ingraham Turns on Hannity and Trump for Dr. Oz Endorsement: ‘I’m Not Afraid to Say It’
